mapper.select: select boardnum ,name ,title from board order by boardnum desc
select boardnum ,name ,hits ,to_char(indate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as indate ,title ,content from board where boardnum = #{int}
mapper.update: update Board set hits=(#{hits}+1) where boardnum = #{boardnum}
mapper.select: select boardnum ,name ,title from board where upper(title) like '%'||upper(#{String})||'%' order by indate asc
